popover.primary: A mastery path focused on hindering your enemies.
popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Hunter grants 8 initiative, 10 toughness and  17 wounds to your lion.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing damage to one enemy with the help of your lion.
popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Axeman grants 12 strength, 18 weapon skill, and 5 toughness to your lion.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing damage to multiple enemies.
popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Axeman grants 20 strength, 8 initiative, 12 toughness, and 20 wounds to your lion.

data.name: Axe Toss
data.description: You fling a throwing axe at your target, dealing X physical damage.

data.name: Spirit Stike
data.description: All of your path of woodsman abilities bypass 50% spirit resistance.

data.name: Baiting Strike
data.description: An attack which momentarily distracts your enemy, dealing (38 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage to them. Your targeted groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, will cause 25% less hatred in all enemy monsters for 5 seconds.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: You gain a 252 unique bonus to Elemental Resistance.

data.name: Blade And Claw
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet of you

data.name: Blindside
data.note: Must be at your target's side or rear
data.description: You attack your enemy at a vulnerable spot, dealing (38 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.15 * STR) + (1.5 * DPS) physical damage immediately and inflicting them with an Ailment which deals an additional (40 + 5 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) physical damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Blindsided!
data.description: Blindside will now also disorient your victim for 10 seconds, causing all of their abilities to take an additional 50% to build up.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Echoing Challenge
data.description: Deals X damage to all enemies with 25ft knocking them down for 2 seconds.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: You gain a 160 unique bonus to Strength.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Call War Lion
data.description:
You call your tamed War Lion to come forth and fight with you.
You may only have a single War Lion at a time.

data.name: Calming Presence
data.description: Any time you are healed, your War Lion will become healed for 25% of the value as long as it is within 30 feet.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You and your War Lion charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50 for 7 seconds. If you or your War Lion use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Cleave Limb
data.description: A sundering blow which deals (38 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 * DPS) physical damage and inflicts your victim with an Ailment which reduces their movement speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Close Bond
data.description: You gain an additional 50 Morale every 5 seconds as long as you have an active War Lion. If your War Lion ever dies, however, you will lose 600 Morale.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Coordinated Strike
data.description: You and your War Lion attack as a pack, ravaging your enemies. You strike your target for (10 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage, and your pet strikes its target for (10 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) physical damage. If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy as well.

data.name: Cull The Weak
data.description: A ruthless attack which deals (49 + 25/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Dominance
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to your target, and heals you for 50% of the damage done.

data.name: Echoing Roar
data.description: You each unleash a blasting shout, interrupting any enemies 40 feet in front of you.

data.name: Ensnare
data.description: Deals 900 damage to your target, and roots them in place for 10 seconds.

data.name: Feline Grace
data.description: Your training and Elven grace allows you to remove all roots and snares from yourself and your War Lion. For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you or your War Lion.

data.name: Fetch!
data.description: You command your War Lion to toss its target through the air, knocking them closer to you.

data.name: Fey Illusion
data.description: You invoke a minor bit of Elven power and attack your target with a befuddling strike, dealing (30 + 5 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 * DPS) physical damage. The enemies attack speed is reduced by 20% for the next 10 seconds. Enemy monsters will become confused and will believe that your selected groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, struck the blow.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flashing Claws
data.description: Increases the chance to parry attacks by 10% for both you and your pet, as long as you have a pet active.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flying Axe
data.description: Deals 1200 damage over 9s to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Force Opportunity
data.description: You strike at your enemy with a brutal attack which causes (28 + 4 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 * DPS) physical damage and can not be defended against. The victim takes a (40 * rank) ability penalty to armor for 10s.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Deafening Roar
data.description: Echoing Roar will now deal X spirit damage to all targets over Ys.

data.name: Hack
data.description: A brutal chop at your enemy which deals (38 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage.

data.name: Merciless Blows
data.description: Shattering Blows will now cause you to gain a (rank * 4) unique bonus to toughness for 10s.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Joy of the Hunt
data.description: Your War Lion is fully healed, and all group members within 100 feet instantly gain 250 Action Points.

data.name: Leonine Frenzy
data.description:
At your command, your War Lion goes berserk with a killing frenzy! All root, snare, and stun effects are removed from your pet, and it becomes immune to them for the next 10 seconds. During this time, your pet will deal an additional (20 + 10/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) physical damage every time it strikes an enemy.
Damage can only trigger once every second.

data.name: Lionheart
data.description: Lion's Fury no longer requires that the target be Cursed, costs 15 fewer action points, and deals (49 + 25/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) spirit damage.

data.name: Lion's Fury
data.description: You draw upon your mystical Elven heritage and furiously attack your target, dealing (28 + 4 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) Spirit damage.

data.name: Loner
data.description: You deal 25% more damage when your War Lion is not called forth.

data.name: Nature's Bond
data.description: Your War Lion regains 785 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Pack Assault
data.description: A feral attack which deals (20 + 10/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage and inspires your groupmates to hunt as a pack. Within the next 5 seconds, each group member within 100 feet will deal an additional (17 + 10/3 * rank) physical damage with their next attack.

data.name: Pack Hunting
data.description: Increases your autoattack speed by 50%.

data.name: Pack Synergy
data.note: Requires an active pet or Trained Traditionally
data.description: Increases the additional damage dealt when either you or your pet critically hits by 50%.

data.name: Pounce
data.note:
You cannot use this ability while airborne
You cannot perform this action while rooted
You cannot perform this action while stunned
You refuse to perform this action while Trained Traditionally
data.description: You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target. When you land, you will inflict (20 + 10/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 * DPS) physical damage, and your movement speed will be increased by 35% for 3 seconds.

data.name: Primal Fury
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will deal 25% more damage.

data.name: Rampage
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, all of your abilities will cool down immediately and not cost any action points. This will also affect your War Lion as well.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Revenge!
data.description: If your War Lion is killed, you will go into a rage and deal 50% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 246 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Shattering Blow
data.description: A powerful attack which shatters your enemy's bones, inflicting a Curse which deals (25 + 6 * rank) + (0.6 * STR) physical damage over 9 seconds. Your target will take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength for 9s.

data.name: Slashing Blade
data.description: A broad sweep of your axe which deals (20 + 10/3 * rank) + (0.17 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Full-Fledged Lion
data.description: Increases your War Lion's movement speed by 50% and its damage by 10%. Debilitative Command and Kill Command cooldowns are reduced to 30s.

data.name: Hack Them Down
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will cause all of their abilities to cost 25% more AP for 5s.

data.name: Submission
data.description:
You cower submissively, causing all enemies within 30 feet to hate you less and deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. For the next 5 seconds, you will cause 25% less hate in all enemy monsters.
If you attack anyone that you've Detaunted, the effect will immediately fade from them.

data.name: Sundering Chop
data.description: A powerful axe chop which deals (20 + 10/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage. If you are behind the enemy, then this attack will ignore (-7 + 25* rank) armor.

data.name: Tearing Blade
data.description: Slashing Blade and Sundering Chop will now cause an additional 258 damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Thin The Herd
data.note: Must be at your target's side or rear
data.description: You call forth a small bit of power as you attack your enemy, dealing (28 + 4 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) + (1.5 DPS) physical damage and causing all healing that they use within the next 10 seconds to become 50% as effective.

data.name: Kurnous's Chosen
data.description: Fey Illusion will now cause your target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to willpower and intelligence.

data.name: Throat Bite
data.description: You command your pet to go for the throat! Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal an additional (20 + 10/3 * rank) + (0.3 * STR) physical damage and will Silence its victim, making them unable to use magic for 4 seconds.

data.name: Trained To Hunt
data.note: Can only have one training active
data.description:
You train your pet to hunt with you, increasing its Strength, Toughness, Wounds, and Weapon Skill by 50% of your bonus gained from items. 50% of the threat you generate goes to your war lion. Any time you strike an enemy, there is a 10% chance that you and your War Lion will be healed for 100% of the damage dealt over 5 seconds. This effect will stack on a new application refreshing to 5 second duration and is capped at 3% of your maximum health per tick.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to reduce enemy movement speed, reduce enemy toughness, and the ability to reduce several enemies' autoattack speeds.

data.name: Trained To Kill
data.note: Can only have one training active.
data.description:
You train your pet to fight ferociously, increasing its Strength and Weapon Skill from your Strength and Weapon Skill gained from items and increasing your Critical Chance by 5%. Your War Lion generates 25% less hatred.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to strike its enemies with a powerful mauling attack, the ability to attack its target repeatedly, and the ability to deal damage over time.

data.name: Trained Traditionally
data.note:
Can only have one training active.
Does not stack with loner.
data.description: You are trained in the traditional arts of protection for the Pheonix King. You do not have a white lion, your superior training improves your damage by 25%, your connection to the Pheonix King causes all of your Path of Woodsman abilites to deal spirit damage, and you simply refuse to pounce. It is beneath one of your dignity.

data.name: Whirling Axe
data.description: You rapidly spin your axe around for up to 3 seconds, dealing (12 + 5/3 * rank) + (0.04 * STR) + (0.75 * DPS) physical damage twice a second to all enemies within 30 feet. This ability will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Debilitative Command
data.description: You command your War Lion to perform a mauling attack deal X physical damage. If your lion is trained to hunt, it will knock the target down for 3s. If your lion is trained to kill, it will disarm your opponent for 4s.

data.name: Kill Command
data.description: You command your War Lion to attack the opponents weakest area. Your War Lion will deal X physical damage to the target. This effect will ignore all armor and always critically strikes.

data.name: Slash Command
data.description: You command your War Lion to swipe in front of it deal x physical damage to all enemies within 25ft in front of your lion.

data.name: Ethereal Cleave
data.description: You cleave your enemies within 30 feet dealing (60 + 9 * rank) + (0.4 * STR) physical damage over 9s. Your targets take a (rank * 2) ability penalty to Initiative and Weaponskill.
